summary: A geneticist takes his assistants to his old family home to locate the deadly product of his late mother's revolutionary research into rapid human evolution - his monstrous tentacled baby brother - before a mad scientist gets to him first.
cast: David Allen Brooks|Rod Steiger|Amanda Pays|Talia Balsam|Kim Hunter|Timothy Gibbs|Peter Frechette|Julia Montgomery|Bunky Jones|Charles Grueber|Bennet Guillory|Edgar Small|Jim Boeke|Randy Harrington|Benjamin J. Perry|Betty Freeman|John Farmer|Steve Conte
title: Trans-Gen, los genes de la muerte
